user.name: Loneliness-The-Eevee
user.about:
I'm a web designer for MCL and SC. MCL stands for MyCandyLove and SC means SweetCrush. I'm not Sociable. I try to focus on my study's. But i have time to make Skins for these very interesting website. I mean like very interesting! =w= I'm called Loneliness cause well i'm lonely. I only have a few friends and my friends nicked name me as the pokemon creepy pasta eevee loneliness. Please if you want a theme Contact me in my Email or In MycandyLove or SweetCrush.

MyCandyLove--->AquarianAreli
SweetCrush--> Loneliness
